# Implementation Plan

## User Stories

### US-001: First story (completed)

- [x] US-001: Add user login functionality

**As a** user
**I want** to login
**So that** I can access my account

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [x] Login form renders
- [x] Form validates input

### US-002: Second story (pending)

- [ ] US-002: Add user registration

**As a** user
**I want** to register
**So that** I can create an account

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Registration form renders
- [ ] Form validates input
- [ ] User is created in database

### US-003: Third story (pending)

- [ ] US-003: Add password reset

**As a** user
**I want** to reset my password
**So that** I can recover my account

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Reset form renders
- [ ] Email is sent
